105834.markdown: Fix: skip instance not found when decoupling vmss from lb ([#105834](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/105834), [@nilo19](https://github.com/nilo19)) [SIG Cloud Provider]

106554.text: Fixed SELinux relabeling of CSI volumes after CSI driver failure.
106554.markdown: Fixed SELinux relabeling of CSI volumes after CSI driver failure. ([#106554](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106554), [@jsafrane](https://github.com/jsafrane)) [SIG Node and Storage]
106554.author: jsafrane

106686.text: Scheduler's assumed pods have 2min instead of 30s to receive nodeName pod updates
106686.markdown: Scheduler's assumed pods have 2min instead of 30s to receive nodeName pod updates ([#106686](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106686), [@ahg-g](https://github.com/ahg-g)) [SIG Scheduling]
106686.author: ahg-g

106695.text: Ensure Pods are removed from the scheduler cache when the scheduler misses deletion events due to transient errors
106695.markdown: Ensure Pods are removed from the scheduler cache when the scheduler misses deletion events due to transient errors ([#106695](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106695), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Scheduling]
106695.author: alculquicondor

106923.text: kubeadm: during execution of the "check expiration" command, treat the etcd CA as external if there is a missing etcd CA key file (etcd/ca.key) and perform the proper validation on certificates signed by the etcd CA. Additionally, make sure that the CA for all entries in the output table is included - for both certificates on disk and in kubeconfig files.
106923.markdown: Kubeadm: during execution of the "check expiration" command, treat the etcd CA as external if there is a missing etcd CA key file (etcd/ca.key) and perform the proper validation on certificates signed by the etcd CA. Additionally, make sure that the CA for all entries in the output table is included - for both certificates on disk and in kubeconfig files. ([#106923](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106923), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
106923.author: neolit123

106927.text: kubeadm: allow the "certs check-expiration" command to not require the existence of the cluster CA key (ca.key file) when checking the expiration of managed certificates in kubeconfig files.
106927.markdown: Kubeadm: allow the "certs check-expiration" command to not require the existence of the cluster CA key (ca.key file) when checking the expiration of managed certificates in kubeconfig files. ([#106927](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/106927), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
106927.author: neolit123
